'''Chiseled polished blackstone''' is the chiseled variation of [[polished blackstone]].

Chiseled Polished Blackstone has a [[Piglin]] nose figure.

{{Breaking row

=== Natural generation ===
Chiseled polished blackstone can generate in [[bastion remnant]]s and [[ruined portal]]s.
